code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cart=()=>{const[cartItems,setCartItems]=useState([]);const addItemToCart=item=>{setCartItems([...cartItems,item]);};const removeItemFromCart=index=>{const newCartItems=cartItems.filter((_,i)=>i!==index);setCartItems(newCartItems);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Shopping Cart"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:cartItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[item.name," - $",item.price,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>removeItemFromCart(index),children:"Remove"})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addItemToCart({name:'Sample Item',price:10}),children:"Add Sample Item"})]});};export default Cart;
